page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT IN SWINFORD
page.content:
{ EMPLOYMENT AMONGST THE PARENTS OF { CHILDREN IN SWINFORD SCHOOL }
Thirty nine families are represented in the school. Unemployemnt within this group is low. The main source of employment for males is the{engineering industry}due to the proximity of Rugby, Coventry and Leicester. { Farming}occupies the second largest group of males and if farmers' wives are included, then farming as a source of employment, equals that of engineering. The majority of women describe themselves as{housewives}though many with children over the age of five, have a variety of part time jobs, particularly{secretarial.
